greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. -x/(1+x-x^3).
comment: Pisano period lengths: 1, 7, 13, 14, 24, 91, 48, 28, 39, 168, 120, 182, 183, 336, 312, 56, 288, 273, 180, 168,.. (which differs from A104217 for example at index 23). - _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 10 2012
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,0,1).
xref: Apart from signs, essentially the same as A050935 and A078013.
results.author: _Creighton Dement_, Mar 24 2005
